draygarDescription: Mighty warrior with high defense and shields.
danitsaDescription: Assassin with high damage and lifesteal.
shieldWallDesc: Creates a powerful shield for 30% of max health. Cooldown: 5 turns.
rageStrikeDesc: Deals a furious strike, increasing attack by 30% for this and the next turn. Cooldown: 4 turns.
berserkDesc: Enters berserk state, gaining +20% speed and +50% attack but reducing defense by 15% for 5 turns. Cooldown: 5 turns.
shadowStrikeDesc: A swift strike from shadows that deals double damage. Cooldown: 3 turns.
voidDanceDesc: Deadly dance that damages all enemies in radius and reduces their accuracy by 10%.
piercingHowlDesc: Deafening howl that reduces all enemies' defense by 25% for 3 turns.
venomBladeDesc: Poisons the weapon, dealing additional poison damage over 4 turns.
earthShatterDesc: Powerful ground slam that stuns enemies and deals area damage.
titanPotionDesc: Next two attacks will deal double damage
shieldGeneratorDesc: Creates a shield equal to 50% of max health
